name: Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey v.152
description: It's the ideal companion of some others of my Flickr Userstyles. Add a Dark Gray Flavor for my Flickr Userstyles : Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1) AND Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2) NEW (2020.04): To install all parts of "Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE" at once, you can use my userscript [Greasyfork]: Flickr WideScreen - BigONE - UserCSS (userstyle/script) Greasy Fork now supports User CSS as defined here for use with Stylus or as UserScript, read: [Beta] User CSS support

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) Some preferences: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre> - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - Télévision: Télérama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns Google - GM - Google MonkeyR Companion I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : ★ MY ★ Installed ★ GM ★ Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : DECEMBRE Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: decembre (USO Mirror) in GreasyFork by example: UserScripts WideScreen Dark/Grey(USO Mirror) Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey 59.1 (addStylish lib) - leoncastro ( GreasyFork) I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portrait★Faces > Portrait★Faces★Open Minded

additional_info: IMPORTANT : ▶ My Flickr ALLinONE styles: - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1): the first and principal to install - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - - Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey ► So far, you should install these 3 userstyles for a better results. To install them at once, a new alternative (in test yet...) for that is : Flickr WideScreen - BigONE - UserCSS (userstyle/script) read: [Beta] User CSS support ► For Better result you need to use dark and minimal scrollbars with it ("minimal" because without it, some scrolling list can lost columns): For Firefox Quantum / Chrome (with Stylus): Overlay Scrollbars - easy customizable For Waterfox "Classic" 56: My Firefox - Slim Dark Scrollbar ► You can test too my other Usertyles (Many are better for A WIDE SCREEN (1920x1080)!): - [NEW] For Favorites pages ( v.1 02.06.2020): Flickr WideScreen - ALLinONE - Favorites Small - For Flickr Viewers : ► Flickr WideScreen (Viewers) - FlickrHiveMind ► Flickr WideScreen (Viewers) - DACKR Viewer ► Flickr WideScreen (Viewer) - FFFLCKR (fffflckr) ▶ You Can Find Many Other Updated Infos About Flickr Extensions / Userscripts / Userstyles / Applications.. In : ► My BIG List (After New Photo Page Design (2014)). I have Updated all links from userscripts.org (OLD USO - Defunct) , to point now to userscripts-mirror.org (USO Mirror - Archives)). ▷ Thumbnail Preview With: ▶ Thumbnail Zoom Plus( Firefox Addon) Very Good addon to use on many sites too.
